h2_title: Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Rusty-Gold Cart
Rusty-Gold Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against toward the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the final of the Five Element Carts and will allow you to get into the Chapter's Secret Area - Bishui Cave.
## Rusty-Gold Cart Boss Fight and Guide

img_summary: The image depicts the Rusty-Gold Cart, a Yaoguai Chief boss encountered in Chapter 5 of *Black Myth: Wukong*. This imposing creature, with a cart-like structure and a menacing design, is part of the Five Element Carts and serves as the final challenge before accessing the chapter's Secret Area, Bishui Cave. The setting appears to be a dark, rocky environment with glowing lava, emphasizing the intense and climactic nature of the boss fight.
